name: the GINGER bag
description:
the GINGER bag custom-made in your favorite fabric. Purchase your bag and select either "VINTAGE botanical" or "VINTAGE geometric" {shown here}. Or choose any of the available fabrics {links below} and contact me to let me know which fabric you would like your bag in. 

measurements: 
15 in. wide
12 in. tall
5 in. deep

the lining is constructed of luxuriously soft faux-suede in a coordinating color. the interior features one zipper pocket and two open pockets. 

beaded handles & removable satin bow included. 

click here to view available fabrics: https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.10152351514619240.1073741835.159940914239&type=1&l=afb13eb65c
